actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Upper Mississippi River in the State of Minnesota as a study river for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Designates, under the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act, a segment of the Upper Mississippi River in the State of Minnesota as a study river for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 1276(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act by designating a segment of the Upper Mississippi River in the State of Minnesota as a study river for potential addition to the Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
